title: Rotational kinetic energy - sphere on rotating rod

content.question: In Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, a solid disk is attached to a rod of negligible mass that is rotating with constant angular speed <math alttext="omega sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> about a pivot at its center. In Figure <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the disk is attached to the rod so that it is centered on the pivot, and the rod again rotates with constant speed <math alttext="omega sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the kinetic energies <math alttext="K sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> of the disk in Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Figure <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub 1 is less than K sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="K sub 1 equals K sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="K sub 1 is greater than, open parenthesis, K sub 2, equals 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="K sub 1 is greater than K sub 2, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="K sub 1 is greater than K sub 2, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>
